00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"
00034 #include "LVQDTargetCalculator.hpp"
00035 #include "MsqMatrix.hpp"
00036 #include "MsqError.hpp"
00037 #include <algorithm>

00040 namespace MESQUITE_NS {
00041 
00042 int LVQDTargetCalculator::add_source( TargetCalculator* source )
00043 {
00044   if (!source)
00045     return -1;
00046   int idx = std::find( uniqueGuides, uniqueGuides+numUniqueGuides, source ) - uniqueGuides;
00047   if (idx == numUniqueGuides) {
00048     assert(idx < 4);
00049     uniqueGuides[idx] = source;
00050     ++numUniqueGuides;
00051   }
00052   return idx;
00053 }
00054 
00055 LVQDTargetCalculator::LVQDTargetCalculator( 
00056                         TargetCalculator* lambda_source,
00057                         TargetCalculator* V_source,
00058                         TargetCalculator* Q_source,
00059                         TargetCalculator* delta_source )
00060   : numUniqueGuides(0)
00061 { 
00062   lambdaIdx = add_source( lambda_source );
00063   vIdx      = add_source( V_source );
00064   qIdx      = add_source( Q_source );
00065   deltaIdx  = add_source( delta_source );
00066 }
00067 
00068 LVQDTargetCalculator::~LVQDTargetCalculator() {}
00069 
00070 bool LVQDTargetCalculator::have_surface_orient() const
00071   { return (vIdx >= 0); }
00072 
00073 bool LVQDTargetCalculator::get_3D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00074                                           size_t element,
00075                                           Sample sample,
00076                                           MsqMatrix<3,3>& W_out,
00077                                           MsqError& err )
00078 {
00079   double lambda[4];
00080   MsqMatrix<3,3> V[4], Q[4], delta[4], W;
00081   bool valid;
00082   
00083   for (int i = 0; i < numUniqueGuides; ++i) {
00084     valid = uniqueGuides[i]->get_3D_target( pd, element, sample, W, err );
00085     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00086       return false;
00087     valid = factor_3D( W, lambda[i], V[i], Q[i], delta[i], err );
00088     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00089       return false;
00090   }
00091   
00092   if (vIdx >= 0) {
00093     W_out = V[vIdx];
00094     if (lambdaIdx >= 0)
00095       W_out *= lambda[lambdaIdx];
00096     if (qIdx >= 0)
00097       W_out = W_out * Q[qIdx];
00098     if (deltaIdx >= 0)
00099       W_out = W_out * delta[deltaIdx];
00100   }
00101   else if (qIdx >= 0) {
00102     W_out = Q[qIdx];
00103     if (lambdaIdx >= 0)
00104       W_out *= lambda[lambdaIdx];
00105     if (deltaIdx >= 0)
00106       W_out = W_out * delta[deltaIdx];
00107   }
00108   else if (deltaIdx >= 0) {
00109     W_out = delta[deltaIdx];
00110     if (lambdaIdx >= 0)
00111       W_out *= lambda[lambdaIdx];
00112   }
00113   else if (lambdaIdx >= 0) {
00114     W_out = MsqMatrix<3,3>(lambda[lambdaIdx]);
00115   }
00116   else {
00117     W_out = MsqMatrix<3,3>(1.0);
00118   }
00119 
00120   return true;
00121 }
00122 
00123   
00124 bool LVQDTargetCalculator::evaluate_guide_2D( PatchData& pd, 
00125                                               size_t element,
00126                                               Sample sample,
00127                                               int idx,
00128                                               double& lambda, 
00129                                               MsqMatrix<3,2>& V,
00130                                               MsqMatrix<2,2>& Q,
00131                                               MsqMatrix<2,2>& delta,
00132                                               MsqError& err )
00133 {
00134   bool valid;
00135   if (uniqueGuides[idx]->have_surface_orient()) {
00136     MsqMatrix<3,2> W;
00137     valid = uniqueGuides[idx]->get_surface_target( pd, element, sample, W, err );
00138     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00139       return false;
00140     valid = factor_surface( W, lambda, V, Q, delta, err );
00141     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00142       return false;
00143   }
00144   else {
00145     MsqMatrix<2,2> W;
00146     valid = uniqueGuides[idx]->get_2D_target( pd, element, sample, W, err );
00147     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00148       return false;
00149     MsqMatrix<2,2> junk;
00150     valid = factor_2D( W, lambda, junk, Q, delta, err );
00151     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00152       return false;
00153     V = MsqMatrix<3,2>(1.0);
00154   }
00155   return true;
00156 }
00157 
00158 bool LVQDTargetCalculator::get_2D_target( PatchData& pd, 
00159                                           size_t element,
00160                                           Sample sample,
00161                                           MsqMatrix<2,2>& W_out,
00162                                           MsqError& err )
00163 {
00164   double lambda[4];
00165   MsqMatrix<3,2> V[4];
00166   MsqMatrix<2,2> W, Q[4], delta[4];
00167   bool valid;
00168   
00169   if (have_surface_orient()) {
00170     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incorrect surface mesh target type", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00171     return false;
00172   }
00173   
00174   
00175   for (int i = 0; i < numUniqueGuides; ++i) {
00176     valid = evaluate_guide_2D( pd, element, sample, i, lambda[i], V[i], Q[i], delta[i], err );
00177     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00178       return false;
00179   }
00180   
00181   if (qIdx >= 0) {
00182     W_out = Q[qIdx];
00183     if (lambdaIdx >= 0)
00184       W_out *= lambda[lambdaIdx];
00185     if (deltaIdx >= 0)
00186       W_out = W_out * delta[deltaIdx];
00187   }
00188   else if (deltaIdx >= 0) {
00189     W_out = delta[deltaIdx];
00190     if (lambdaIdx >= 0)
00191       W_out *= lambda[lambdaIdx];
00192   }
00193   else if (lambdaIdx >= 0) {
00194     W_out = MsqMatrix<2,2>(lambda[lambdaIdx]);
00195   }
00196   else {
00197     W_out = MsqMatrix<2,2>(1.0);
00198   }
00199 
00200   return true;
00201 }
00202 
00203 
00204 bool LVQDTargetCalculator::get_surface_target( PatchData& pd, 
00205                                           size_t element,
00206                                           Sample sample,
00207                                           MsqMatrix<3,2>& W_out,
00208                                           MsqError& err )
00209 {
00210   double lambda[4];
00211   MsqMatrix<3,2> V[4], W;
00212   MsqMatrix<2,2> Q[4], delta[4], junk, W2;
00213   bool valid;
00214   
00215   if (!have_surface_orient()) {
00216     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Incorrect surface mesh target type", MsqError::INTERNAL_ERROR );
00217     return false;
00218   }
00219   
00220   
00221   for (int i = 0; i < numUniqueGuides; ++i) {
00222     valid = evaluate_guide_2D( pd, element, sample, i, lambda[i], V[i], Q[i], delta[i], err );
00223     if (MSQ_CHKERR(err) || !valid)
00224       return false;
00225   }
00226   
00227   if (vIdx >= 0) {
00228     W_out = V[vIdx];
00229     if (lambdaIdx >= 0)
00230       W_out *= lambda[lambdaIdx];
00231     if (qIdx >= 0)
00232       W_out = W_out * Q[qIdx];
00233     if (deltaIdx >= 0)
00234       W_out = W_out * delta[deltaIdx];
00235   }
00236   else if (qIdx >= 0) {
00237     W_out(0,0) = Q[qIdx](0,0); W_out(0,1) = Q[qIdx](0,1);
00238     W_out(1,0) = Q[qIdx](1,0); W_out(1,1) = Q[qIdx](1,1);
00239     W_out(2,0) = 0.0;          W_out(2,1) = 0.0;
00240     if (lambdaIdx >= 0)
00241       W_out *= lambda[lambdaIdx];
00242     if (deltaIdx >= 0)
00243       W_out = W_out * delta[deltaIdx];
00244   }
00245   else if (deltaIdx >= 0) {
00246     W_out(0,0) = delta[deltaIdx](0,0); W_out(0,1) = delta[deltaIdx](0,1);
00247     W_out(1,0) = delta[deltaIdx](1,0); W_out(1,1) = delta[deltaIdx](1,1);
00248     W_out(2,0) = 0.0;                  W_out(2,1) = 0.0;
00249     if (lambdaIdx >= 0)
00250       W_out *= lambda[lambdaIdx];
00251   }
00252   else if (lambdaIdx >= 0) {
00253     W_out = MsqMatrix<3,2>(lambda[lambdaIdx]);
00254   }
00255   else {
00256     W_out = MsqMatrix<3,2>(1.0);
00257   }
00258 
00259   return true;
00260 }
